channel.title: Shatt3rscape Remade [recruiting]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i224.photobucket.com/albums/dd117/huntersplint/14ebb5b4.jpg[/img] ~huntersplint~
[font=Verdana][url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,199919.0.html]DOWNLOAD TO FIRST ONE[/font]
[b]Hey everyone. I'm going to make a very good pk server from fr33sc4p3. It will be a unique server, a lot of time put into it, but not spread out, mainly dealing with varrock and various teleport-to-able...areas. But, I can't do everything on my own, and need your help ;)[/b] [b][size=20pt]Note to mods: I'm not advertising, but trying to get some good helpers with making a good server, and trying to get new people that attempt to help code to learn a bit more.[/size][/b] [color=blue][center]All I need are some coders, and testers(look for bugs :)) AND A 24/7(close to it) HOSTER[/center]
[center]Coders/Learners[/center] [center]Me[/center] [center]Ptolemy Alch[/center] [center]Wikkedvoodoo[/center] [center]Si Force[/center] [center]Hippie[/center] [center]Swordskid61[/center] [center]Sp3c[/center] [center]Erc[/center] [center]†™[/center] [center]dark claw[/center] [center]Vengence[/center] [center]kilermage3[/center] [center]blade9670[/center] [center]xdarklight.x[/center] [center]Keasho[/center] [center]aftereffect[/center] [center]X-J-K-X[/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center] [center]-[/center]
[center]Testers[/center] [center]Huntersplunt[/center] [center]Syrillia[/center] [center]Erc[/center] [center]js53[/center] [center]-[/center]
[center]Hoster[/center] [center]-[/center]
[center]Goals:[/center] [center]Get a few more skills working.[/center] [center]Mining[/center] [center]Smelting[/center] [center]Wc[/center] [center]Pk Box[/center] [center]Good weapon levels/prices, plus make money easier to get.[/center] [center]Levels easy to acquire[/center] [center]Not the generic pk source[/center] [center]Anything else you people come up with[/center]
[code]Job wanted: If coder, XP: Proof: If hoster, Reliable?: If hoster, Keep server on AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE?: Active on forums/in game?:[/code]
Note: I have just downloaded Fr33, and am currently working on adding those 3 skills. Post :D
